Title: AB 63
Description: AB 63 repeals the AB 540 in-state tuition eligibility for undocumented students who attended a California high school.

Title: AB 130/131
Description: The California Dream Act expands scholarships and financial aid to undocumented students.

Title: AB 130/131
Description: The California Dream Act expands scholarships and financial aid to undocumented students.

Title: AB 346
Description: ensures that there is a polling place on each UC, CSU, and CCC campus.

Title: AB 620
Description: AB 620 requires UC, CSU, and CCC to adopt policies against the harrassment and bullying of LGBT faculty, staff and students.

Title: AB 970
Description: requires UC and CSU to  provide public notice and allow for public comment before implementing a fee increase.

Title: AB 1326
Description: AB 1326 imposes an oil and gas severance tax to fund public higher education.

Title: SB 1461
Description: SB 1461 prevents increases in fees for each incoming UC and CSU class for four years.

Title: AB 1501
Description: The Middle Class Scholarship reduces fees by 2/3 for students from families that earn less than $150,000 per year.

Title: SB 1539
Description: SB 1539 requires textbook publishers to provide detailed pricing information.

Title: AB 1561
Description: AB 1561 limits compensation increases for executives at UC and CSU.

Title: AB 1464
Description: The 2012 Budget resulted in a $250 million in trigger cuts in the event of the failure of Prop 30.

Title: AB 2442
Description: Establishes the State Hope Public Trust for the support of the public university systems.

Title: AB 2202
Description: Mandates LAO study on expanding access to postsecondary education to underserved groups.

Title: AB 1723
Description: Requires live audio transmissions for UC Regent Meetings.

Title: SB 185
Description: Authorizes UC and CSU to consider race, gender, ethnicity, and national origin in undergraduate and graduate admissions.

Title: SB 1052
Description: Establishes the Open Education Resources Council.

Title: SB 1466
Description: Establishes required eligibilities for CalGrant recipients.

Title: SB 1053
Description: Establishes the Digital Open Source Library.

Title: SB 1356
Description: Establishes the Higher Education Investment Tax Credit Program Special Fund.

Title: SB 259
Description: Allows student employees to be considered as employees for purposes of existing law.

Title: SB 1289
Description: Requires information related to private student loans be disclosed by institutions of higher education when they report on student debt.

Title: AB 1500
Description: Appropriates revenue to Middle Class Scholarship

Title: AB 1502
Description: allocates $125 million to UC and CSU systems if voters approve Prop 30
